Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. I believe it could significantly enhance your capabilities or lifestyle in ways that only top-tier solutions can. Given its unparalleled features and benefits, we are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $750000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as the value it brings far exceeds its cost. I look forward to your consideration and hope to discuss how this product can revolutionize your experience. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
